properties.name: ZeetaData
properties.description:
Offering fully customisable Monte Carlo engines for the global financial services and energy communities.

New legislation requires banking and insurance entities to build internal models thus increasing the expected demand for sophisticated insurance and banking risk analytics in the years to come.

The problem to solve? ZeetaData targets to resolve the huge challenge in the financial services industry of having up and running a fully dedicated Monte Carlo simulation engine; ZeetaData is aiming to provide a one stop shop bundling together the data validation, nested calculations, results visualization and interaction phases under a single umbrella.

ZeetaData runs scalable Monte Carlo engines securely, faster and more accurately on the runtime.

More at: http://www.teamapp.co
